entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Detah
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
